nodes.documentation: @dev the constructor
nodes.name: TokenSale

nodes.documentation:
@dev The fallback function is called when ether is sent to the contract, it
 simply calls `doPayment()` with the address that sent the ether as the
 `_owner`. Payable is a required solidity modifier for functions to receive
 ether, without this modifier functions will throw if ether is sent to them

@notice `proxyPayment()` allows the caller to send ether to the TokenSale and
 have the tokens created in an address of their choosing
nodes.name: proxyPayment

nodes.documentation:
@notice Notifies the controller about a transfer, for this TokenSale all
 transfers are allowed by default and no extra notifications are needed
nodes.name: onTransfer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Notifies the controller about an approval, for this TokenSale all
 approvals are allowed by default and no extra notifications are needed
nodes.name: onApprove

nodes.documentation: @dev setter for the transferable flag
nodes.name: makeTransferable

nodes.documentation: @dev update method for all the dates
nodes.name: updateDates

nodes.documentation: @dev utility function to allow the owner to handle the early sale purchases
nodes.name: handleEarlySaleBuyers

nodes.documentation: @dev utility function to allow the owner to handle private and bitcoin buyers
nodes.name: handleExternalBuyers
doPayment

nodes.documentation: @dev Allow the owner of TokenSale to change the controller of the token
nodes.name: changeTokenController
finalizeSale

nodes.documentation: @notice Pauses the contribution if there is any issue
nodes.name: pauseContribution

nodes.documentation: @notice Resumes the contribution
nodes.name: resumeContribution
